thread.title: Emma Stone Has Best Reaction to Winning at SAG Awards, Gives an Endearing Speech (Video)
thread.title_full: Emma Stone Has Best Reaction to Winning at SAG Awards, Gives an Endearing Speech (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: Emma Stone Has Best Reaction to Winning at SAG Awards, Gives an Endearing Speech (Video)
text:
Emma Stone took home the award for Best Actress at the 2017 Screen Actors Guild Awards and she had an amazing reaction to her name being called!
The 28-year-old La La Land actress looked like she was shocked to win the award, even though she was definitely the favorite, and her speech was so endearing.
Emma paid close attention to the clock and when she was told to wrap up, she told the crowd how she feels ‚Äúinsecure a lot of the time, genuinely.‚Äù At the end of the speech, she held her head in her hands while former Superbad co-star Jonah Hill escorted her backstage.
Emma took a moment during her speech to talk about the political climate right now.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre in a tricky time in the world and our country and things are inexcusable and scary and need action,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so grateful to be part of a group of people that cares and wants to reflect things back to society.‚Äù
Emma Stone receives the SAG Award for Female Actor in a Leading Role! #LaLaLand #sagawards üé≠ pic.twitter.com/Sbyuy48Q9l
